game.name: PHOGS!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PHOGS에서 두 마리의 강아지가 되어 퍼즐로 가득한 매력적인 모험을 떠나보세요. 늘어나는 배로 이어진 강아지들로 짖고 물고 점프해서 장애물을 피하고 음식, 잠, 놀이 등 다양한 테마의 월드를 혼자서 또는 둘이서 즐겨보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In PHOGS! you play as a duo of dogs on a captivating, puzzle-filled adventure. Linked by a stretchy belly, you’ll need to bark, bite and bounce your way through obstacles set across the themed worlds of Food, Sleep and Play, in co-op or single-player.
